title: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
description: When adding an exception breakpoint in the debug perspective and subsequently cancelling the process, the breakpoint is still added and takes effect during debugging.
OB: The breakpoint is still added and takes effect during debugging, even after cancelling the process.
EB: The breakpoint should not be added and should not take effect during debugging after cancelling the process.
SR:
1) Go to the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective
2) Click the J! button to add an exception
3) In the progress dialog, click cancel.
